home.title: Welcome to Mubwiza Garden
home.subtitle: Fresh flowers, vegetables, fruits, tea spices & quality seedlings from Rwanda's Northern Province
home.aboutText1: Located at Muhabura Integrated Polytechnic College (MIPC) in Musanze District, Northern Province of Rwanda, Mubwiza Garden is your trusted source for fresh, quality garden products.
home.aboutText2: We specialize in providing beautiful flowers for decoration and gifts, fresh organic vegetables and fruits, aromatic tea and spices, and quality seedlings to help you start your own garden.

about.title: About Mubwiza Garden
about.subtitle: Growing fresh, natural products in the heart of Rwanda
about.storyText1: Mubwiza Garden is located in the beautiful Northern Province of Rwanda, specifically in Musanze District at the Muhabura Integrated Polytechnic College (MIPC). Our garden represents a commitment to sustainable agriculture and providing fresh, quality products to our community.
about.storyText2: We specialize in growing a diverse range of products including beautiful flowers for decoration and gifts, fresh organic vegetables and fruits, aromatic tea and spices, and quality seedlings for those who want to start their own gardens.
about.storyText3: Our mission is to provide the freshest, highest quality garden products while supporting sustainable farming practices and contributing to the local community's well-being.
about.flowersDesc: Beautiful, fresh flowers for all occasions - from decorations to gifts.
about.vegetablesDesc: Locally grown, organic vegetables harvested at peak freshness.
about.fruitsDesc: Fresh, seasonal fruits grown with care in our gardens.
about.spicesDesc: Aromatic tea and spices to enhance your culinary experience.
about.seedlingsDesc: Healthy seedlings to help you start your own garden.
about.sustainabilityDesc: We practice sustainable farming methods that protect our environment for future generations.
about.communityDesc: We're committed to supporting our local community and contributing to Rwanda's agricultural development.
about.qualityDesc: We ensure the highest quality in all our products, from seed to harvest to your table.

footer.description: Located in Rwanda's Northern Province, Musanze District at Muhabura Integrated Polytechnic College (MIPC), we provide fresh flowers, vegetables, fruits, tea spices, and quality seedlings.
